text:
Another question.  I tried using PyPlot in Pluto as shown in this issue <https://github.com/fonsp/Pluto.jl/issues/141>

However, I keep running into segmentation errors: *`Distributed.ProcessExitedException(8)`*

Something to do with macro expansion?

```Worker 8 terminated.Distributed
.ProcessExitedException(8)Distributed.ProcessExitedException(8)
Stacktrace:
 [1] worker_from_id(pg::Distributed.ProcessGroup, i::Int64)
   @ Distributed /Users/julia/buildbot/worker/package_macos64/build/usr/share/julia/stdlib/v1.5/Distributed/src/cluster.jl:1074

 [2] worker_from_id
   @ Distributed /Users/julia/buildbot/worker/package_macos64/build/usr/share/julia/stdlib/v1.5/Distributed/src/cluster.jl:1071 [inlined]

 [3] #remotecall#141(kwargs::Base.Iterators.Pairs{Union{},Union{},Tuple{},NamedTuple{(),Tuple{}}}, ::typeof(Distributed.remotecall), f::Function, id::Int64, args...::Module)
   @ Distributed /Users/julia/buildbot/worker/package_macos64/build/usr/share/julia/stdlib/v1.5/Distributed/src/remotecall.jl:376

 [4] remotecall
   @ Distributed /Users/julia/buildbot/worker/package_macos64/build/usr/share/julia/stdlib/v1.5/Distributed/src/remotecall.jl:376 [inlined]

 [5] macro expansion
   @ Pluto /Applications/Julia-1.5.app/Contents/Resources/julia/bin/../share/julia/base/task.jl:403 [inlined]

 [6] macro expansion
   @ Distributed /Users/julia/buildbot/worker/package_macos64/build/usr/share/julia/stdlib/v1.5/Distributed/src/macros.jl:224 [inlined]

 [7] macro expansion
   @ Pluto /Applications/Julia-1.5.app/Contents/Resources/julia/bin/../share/julia/base/task.jl:332 [inlined]

 [8] remotecall_eval(m::Module, procs::Array{Int64,1}, ex::Expr)
   @ Distributed /Users/julia/buildbot/worker/package_macos64/build/usr/share/julia/stdlib/v1.5/Distributed/src/macros.jl:218

 [9] create_emptyworkspacemodule(pid::Int64)
   @ Pluto.WorkspaceManager ~/.julia/packages/Pluto/luIaC/src/evaluation/WorkspaceManager.jl:100

[10] #delete_vars#14(kwargs::Base.Iterators.Pairs{Symbol,Array{Pluto.Cell,1},Tuple{Symbol},NamedTuple{(:to_run,),Tuple{Array{Pluto.Cell,1}}}}, ::typeof(Pluto.WorkspaceManager.delete_vars), session_notebook::Tuple{Pluto.ServerSession,Pluto.Notebook}, to_delete::Set{Symbol}, funcs_to_delete::Set{Tuple{Base.UUID,Array{Symbol,1}}}, module_imports_to_move::Set{Expr})

[11] #run_reactive!#68(deletion_hook::Function, persist_js_state::Bool, ::typeof(Pluto.run_reactive!), session::Pluto.ServerSession, notebook::Pluto.Notebook, old_topology::Pluto.NotebookTopology, new_topology::Pluto.NotebookTopology, cells::Array{Pluto.Cell,1})
   @ Pluto ~/.julia/packages/Pluto/luIaC/src/evaluation/Run.jl:65

[12] run_reactive!
   @ Pluto ~/.julia/packages/Pluto/luIaC/src/evaluation/Run.jl:26 [inlined]

[13] macro expansion
